title: Dreamfall Chapters Special Edition (v2.17.0.24) [GOG]
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_dreamfall_chapters_32bit_2.17.0.24.exe" (x86 version) or "setup_dreamfall_chapters_2.17.0.24.exe" (x64 version)
- Play!

Genre: Action - Adventure - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.9.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Ubuntu 16.04)
Languages: Audio and text: Deutsch, English. Text only: franÃ§ais
Features: single-player
Released: October 21, 2014
Company: Red Thread Games / Red Thread Games
Rating: PEGI Rating: 16+ (with Bad Language, Violence)
Included goodies: 7 HD wallpapers + soundtrack (FLAC) + soundtrack (MP3) + 5 avatars + Reborn: The Art of Dreamfall Chapters Book 1 + 2 Journeys Birth short stories (coming soon) + Europolis tourist map
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/dreamfall_chapt...al_edition

About:
Dreamfall Chapters Special Edition includes the following bonus goodies:

Reborn: The Art of Dreamfall Chapters Book One â€” a digital art book featuring concept art and illustrations from the first episode of Dreamfall Chapters
Journeys Birth â€” two short stories in PDF and ebook formats, set in The Longest Journey universe and leading up to the events in Dreamfall Chapters (available October 20th)
Digital soundtrack featuring music from Dreamfall Chapters Book One in FLAC and MP3 format (available November 1st)
Digital Europolis tourist map! Sponsored by Niyom Media and presented by Crowboy, everyoneâ€™s favourite crow cowboy (coming soon!)
7 HD wallpapers
5 digital avatars featuring characters from Dreamfall Chapters.

Dreamfall Chapters is the highly anticipated Kickstarted-funded follow-up to award-winning adventure games The Longest Journey and Dreamfall: The Longest Journey.

Dreamfall Chapters is an episodic, story-driven adventure game about choices and consequences, dreams and reality, magic and science, chaos and order, and the broken heroes whose actions will shape the course of history in all worlds.

Revisiting familiar locations and characters, and introducing new sights and sounds, new faces, new game mechanics, new thrills and challenges, Dreamfall Chapters takes players on an epic journey â€” from the dystopian cyberpunk future of Stark, through the mysterious and dreamlike Storytime, to the magical landscapes of Arcadia.

In a story about faith and hope and change, about the choices we make and the people we are destined to become, players will explore these fantastic worlds and mature themes through the eyes of three playable characters.

The sequel to acclaimed Adventure Game of the Year, Dreamfall: The Longest Journey
Experience a deep and emotional episodic storyline that continues the epic saga of The Longest Journey â€” an award-winning story the New York Times called â€œcompellingâ€ and â€œterrificâ€.
Explore beautiful, rich, detailed and original worlds that combine a stunning cyberpunk vision of the future with magical fantasy, along with a broken and decaying dreamscape
Embark on three different journeys, seen through the eyes of multiple characters, and witness the story told from their unique perspectives.
Shape the story and the course of your journey through your choices and actions, and live with the surprising and sometimes devastating consequences.
Connect your game and see the choices your friends have made before making your own, and share your decisions with everyone playing the game.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP SP3,
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent,
Memory: 3 GB RAM,
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000,
Hard Drive: 5 GB available space,
DirectX: Version 9.0c,
Sound Card.

Recommended system requirements - Windows: Windows 7,
Processor: Quad Core i5 2.5GHz,
Memory: 4 GB RAM,
Graphics: ATI or Nvidia card with 1GB VRAM,
DirectX: Version 11,
Hard Drive: 20 GB available space,
Sound Card
